cr-original-review-content (2):
My first Mould King kit and I couldn’t be happier. No missing parts, for the most part a very smooth build. Ran into a few issues with the lower front end. And some of the grill and rear grill plating pieces were extremely loose and needed some glue.
The overall construction was great, sometimes instruction view left you scratching your head, but after a while you understand what you need to do. Most kits I have done there is always a couple of snafus where you have to take apart an assembly to reconstruct it, but that’s part of the hobby and I don’t mind it. That said the build on this was very enjoyable and straightforward. The two sword windshield wipers are a great touch.
This kit when put together, is a great show piece. The wing back tail is iconic for cars if that era. I look forward to building a few more kits I have collected from Mould Kings. And lastly you just can’t beat the price. If this was a Lego kit you would pay minimum twice what it is on sale for. Happy building my friends!
Beautiful when finished, fun build. No missing pieces, great instructions. Will definitely try more Mould King builds in the future. Highly recommend.

Its an amazing build for price, only complaint is the roof isn’t as solid and falls down easy but that can be corrected afterall its exactly like legos and far superior to the old megablocks kits. Also the vehicle height is adjustable front and back by just pulling wheels down in a clicking type of function giving an air ride look

Edit: Their customer service is excellent. They did reach out to correct/replace the missing pieces. For the price point, it is a great set and I do plan to purchase more sets from them.

Great design and decent quality. Only real issue is missing several (8) important pieces. Was able to substitute the missing pieces to finish the build.

Fun & challenging to build!
Not for the beginner.
Loose fitting parts, improper alignment of the back seat, required modification. Otherwise was a good build, three way adjustable suspension is nice, only two missing pieces.

Super gift for the adult car collector. My son has a car that he is is restoring exactly like this one. So this was an awesome gift. He loves it. Great quality. Many small pieces. He had to use tweezers and curved pliers for the super small pieces. I wouldn't recommend this product for children. The pieces do stick together well.
Was a great build looks great with my Lego cars and a third of the price

cr-original-review-content: That my grandson liked his gift!
cr-original-review-content (2): My grandson was absolutely delighted!!! It’s a great idea and he was very happy putting it together and now playing with it!!
The car is great...build was straight forward...only thing the trunk doesn't open by itself...must be removed which makes it pointless having a spare tire in trunk if can't you lift the trunk lid

cr-original-review-content: Nice product, missing pieces, no obvious way to contact seller.
cr-original-review-content (2):
The car (old school Cadillac) looks great. Instructions are good. I've used Mould King in the past and although not to Lego standards, easily worth the kit price (around half of that of a similar Lego set).

This particular set has not been finished, as we are missing two pieces critical to the structure. We can pilfer from the massive bin of broken brick builds, or order from Lego direct - but both methods are hugely time intensive and steal a little thunder from the Christmas Morning build fest! It happens, but I would like to see Mould King / this seller either have obvious contact info or work on quality control.

cr-original-review-content: Caddie convertible reminds you of Elvis when building!
cr-original-review-content (2): Awesome build with great looking interior the only let down is the engine, no block, pistons, or rotating assembly.,

Bought this for my dad, he loved it! But did mention the pieces don’t fit together super nicely and some area’s like the doors and trunk don’t align properly and take some finesse to get them to open/close without pieces falling off lol. Great for displaying! But not so much for playing so be advised if gifting to a child
This is my second Mould King car I have put together and both have been really fun. Highly recommended

cr-original-review-content: Like the car, not so much the fit
cr-original-review-content (2):
Bought it because I really liked the car. Some of the pieces just dangle with nothing behind them. Others don't fit snuggly, especially on the rear fins, the rear sides and the rear bumper. Finished it. Went to move it and the rear fins fell off. Then the rear bumper fell off while trying to put things back together. I ended up gluing pretty much the entire rear of the car. Kind of disappointed and debating whether or not I'll by another set.
Update March 28, 2024: I was contacted by the manufacturer offering to make things right. I was pleasantly surprised by that. Makes me feel better about purchasing another set in the future. Added another star.
This product was amazing. It definitely made me feel like a kid again. Great quality pieces like Lego brand at half the price. Easy to follow instructions. Great product. Will buy more.
Neat lego’s
My 9 year old son spend 2 afternoons building this car. The pieces connected very well unlike some non Lego brands. The finished product turned out great. We were very pleased with this prodeuct
My son loved this set. He recently got into Lego's and building cars. It was a great gift that he is enjoying putting together.
Beautiful set. Had a blast.
It’s is exactly what it’s supposed to do

This was my second Mould King Product. Was pleased with the first one so I ordered another. This one was missing 2 pieces on the final step Update! Mould King reached out immediately and they are currently working to get the missing pieces. I will make final update when I received the required blocks to finish the build. FINAL UPDATE. Customer Service was Outstanding. Received the missing pieces and build complete.

Not quite the quality of the major brand but well worth the money at 1/3 the price of comparable sets from major brand. Larger plates took alot of force to get together make sure you have them correct as the do not come apart easily. No missing pieces had a couple extra small ones left. Front wheels do not steer but all 4 can be adjusted for ride height. Only design feature I was unhappy with was I think there should have been an A pillar on side of windscreen and what I think is supposed to be the vent window on doors looks wierd and took it off. Overall still quite happy with value for money would buy again.

cr-original-review-content: Take your time,in my case I had to use glue to keep pcs to stay connected
cr-original-review-content (2): Had some issues with pcs not locking together. I ended up gluing them to stay connected. But it turned out looking good for my collection.
It is a gift, came quickly with no damage
Definitely not the quality of a Lego. Pieces just don’t fit good. never finished it. I was very disappointed. I was wondering why the price was a lot cheaper.

Look out Lego I've found a new friend. I have found myself kind of addicted to Legos, but my budget, no so much. This is a definitely alternative. I was impressed with the instructions and ease of the build. I did run into a few pieces that didn't want to stay put, but as I have no plans to dismantle my car, a little glue solved the problem. I will definitely buy another set to build.

I loved this from start to finish every part was there not that there wasn't a hiccup or two but overall great fun build the hardest part for me that stands out was connecting the trunk lid to the car and one of the rear fender part kept falling off until I got down the road with the build my next build will be coming from this company
Better than expected. I had my doubts as it is not the known brand but I was surprised. The instructions were clear, no missing pieces and feels really sturdy.

cr-original-review-content: Amazing kit, even compared to "Official" ones.
cr-original-review-content (2):
This kit was absolutely fantastic. Assembly instructions were easy to understand. Brick quality is higher than expected and I had zero fitment issues. I was not expecting much from this kit for the price, but came away wanting more kits by Mould King.

In a brick building kit that cost 1/4 the price of an "official" kit I got opening doors, truck and hood as well as a fairly good approximation of an engine. The wheels are independentantly height adjustable from super low to untra high, meaning you can even pose it in a lowrider style three-wheeling pose if that's your thing.

I have already ordered additional Mould King kits, as this one was worth every cent.

cr-original-review-content: Cadi-Elrado.. they deserve a sponsor from Cadillac!
cr-original-review-content (2):
Bought this car on a whim after being gobsmacked by the price of Lego cars on the market. It's much larger than expected(see picture of Legos McLaren on it). It's way nicer in person and was a blast to assemble. I had all the pieces, although the instructions overlap so you can't ever finish a "section" (pretty sure it's on purpose).
As another review mentioned, a few of the peices come off easy(taillights specifically). Nothing a couple dabs of superglue couldn't fix.
10/10 would buy again. Well worth the money.

cr-original-review-content: Fun build, but requires minor fixes
cr-original-review-content (2): It definitely was a fun piece to build. Overall, it looks really nice. It resembles what it was designed after. One thing I did not like was how the door was built and functioned. It is not a clear fitting door. There are gaps, and don't close all the way. The quality of the plastic is decent. Definitely not a lego, but not bad at all. I did have some colored (red, black) larger pieces with swirl marks that might have been formed when the plastic was poired into the mold. Also, some pieces had smudges I didn't know where they came from. Those smudge were able to be erased with qtip and little bit of enamel paint thinner. Overall, it was fun, great looking piece.

I loved this model kit, it was super easy to build and looks amazing, the wheels are on moveable legs letting you get the option for lowering or raising each wheel indepentantly.

Bags are numbered but you need to look close because there is a 1-1 , 1- 2 and so on. There is a slight overlap and you will need to open a bag before using all the peices of the previous bag.

Over all this is a great set. Cant wait to build more Mould King sets.

Sometimes the instructions weren’t too clear as to where to place certain pieces which made you scratch your head on how it works best. Another point is that some parts on the car are very fragile in the sense that if you hold or touch a certain way then that piece will fall off, especially on the rear sides of the car. The build all together was still fun but I expected a bit more from it especially with such a beautiful design of the car.

cr-original-review-content: One of my more frustrating builds
cr-original-review-content (2): The car is pretty and all, but not that easy to build. With most building block vehicles, putting the wheels on is about the last step. I had to put the back wheels on with the first bag making it more difficult to press pieces together. I would like to see smaller bags so the pieces would be easier to find. Using different colors for parts that won't be seen when completed would help with finding them and orientation purposes. I do like the price and may be doing more of these knock-off kits in the future.

I myself am building to give as a gift to a car enthusiasts. Give your self time if never built one and pay close attention to photo instructions. Parts snap tightly together,worth every penny of purchase. When and if want a display case dimensions match lego size of 1/15th scale.

Will order from this company again. Being budget legos I was not expecting much, assumed I would be missing pieces and it would have convoluted instructions, however that was not the case. Everything was as it should be and easy to understand. And only $60 is a steal. It's over a foot long. Name brand legos would charge double for this

cr-original-review-content: Cheap but fun to put together
cr-original-review-content (2):
The car was missing some pieces. Additionally, the final build is delicate, and moving pieces will come off if youre not careful. Most blocks hold well together, but sometimes the grip is poor. However, for the relative cost compared to legos, it was worth the price. It also looks great on a shelf. It took me a couple hours to put together and was fun.

I would recommend buying this car, but make sure you have some extra lego pieces laying around if anything is missing.
Easy to assemble and the direction ls are spot on. It is bigger than you think so have the proper space to store.

cr-original-review-content: Great set to build with friends
cr-original-review-content (2): I bought this and built it on a folding table with friends it was very easy and fun I've bought a few mould king sets and the quality is very nice
IT TOOK MY SON ALONG TIME TO PUT TOGETHER BUT END RESULT IS NICE ADJUSTABLE SUSPENSION I HAVE MINE ON 3 WHEELS LIKE A LOW RIDER
Good product and pretty easily to follow when assembling. Looks very cool when completed.

cr-original-review-content: This car is much better Quality than I expected.
cr-original-review-content (2): All the parts were present, although a hand full were in the following bag. The the black parts were really shiny, dare I say, better than the black Lego Camaro Z-28 I built last year. The car is very strong, but this is a model so I would not suggest it for playing.
Really nice model. Sturdy when complete. Looks awesome. One of my favorites so far.
Very good quality and awesome detail.

cr-original-review-content: The Cadillac Lego wish they built
cr-original-review-content (2): This is a very nice set. My son who is a master Lego builder. Had a great time putting this together. The functionality of this Cadillac after putting it together, is a great experience for anyone.
Can't brag about this build enough, she's beautiful. More detail than expected, hood and trunk open, detailed interior, even has sun screens. Just top notch,
Lindo y buena calidad
Some parts did not want to stay together and the illustrations could have been better.
I am into cars and I enjoy building then but this one had to be my favorite design it took me awhile to build but I enjoyed it
Very happy with the product and the on-time delivery would do business with the seller again

cr-original-review-content: WARNING :garbage quality product and sketchy business
cr-original-review-content (2):
Finally started building this set got to step 4 and already missing pieces...went thru several steps and its missing toooo mannny pieces....and others are warped ...ive built 1000's of LEGO sets and never had one issue ....this set is a HOT MESS....im trying to contact seller for a refund....TRASH that went in the trash...EDIT:after posting this review the company contacted me with this...We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience regarding your order and would like to offer you a full refund for your purchase.
If you would like a full refund: please reply 'Full refund'.
We hope that you give us another chance. Thank you very much.
Best regards,MOULD KING.....however they then asked me to click a link to communicate outside of Amazon and when i said no i was informed this was the only way to recieve a refund.....yaaaa no thnx...so 0000 refund on an terrible product ...
Was really good and packed nicely only downside instructions aren't in English.
Son In law loved it
Just finished this kit. Instructions were easy to follow, bags are numbered and divided into 3 steps. No missing pieces either, actually have extra pieces. Pretty simple build and looks great.
Very cool set. Well detailed.
Strong snapping , easy instructions and pieces quality are the best in this kit
It was a fun build. No missing pieces, clear instructions, numbered bags, no problems. Very calming, helped with anxiety.

This was a terrible build, I couldn't even finish it. Instructions weren't very clear and the bricks just didn't hold together like real Legos. Very frustrating, don't buy the knock off versions to save money. Buy the real thing and you'll be able to finish your build and feel good about it.

One side of the cars front end did not fit well. Every time I had to add a peice it would fall apart. I ended up have to glue some peices just to get them to hold. I’m very disappointed as this looked like it would be fun to build.
Don’t even finish it.

a-profile-name: This was the biggest mistake I’ve made nothing stays together missing parts so made
cr-original-review-content (2): Want stay together missing parts I’ve spent a lot of time can’t even finish

cr-original-review-content: Just as good as name brand.
cr-original-review-content (2): High quality and amazing price. Have bought more mould king products since.
It's sad when your kiddos are excited to build something and your missing pieces straight out the box to build it.......
Head light parts were missing
Would have been great if I had all the pieces included in the package.
Will not stay together when assemblingand hard pictures don't match the assembly.
Assembly book is totally horrible!! Pieces don't stay locked together very well..Finished product looks absolutely horrible from sides..I will make certain to not buy this brand again
The QC lacks. The assembly manual was not clear. Parts were missing. Some parts required model cement to hold together.
This product is not as good as Lego, but was fun for my son to build and turned out great!
Pieces always missing good prices for alike legos
This product was missing a lot of parts. every part for the engine was missing. Not worth buying

cr-original-review-content: Looks so much better in person!

cr-original-review-content (2): My wife got me got me this for Christmas and I loved putting it together. It wasn’t like other technic models and was a little challenging keeping some parts together at times. All the pieces were there and packaged nicely. I will definitely be buying more mould king sets!
this product was missing 7 major pieces
Fast shipping
Missing a piece of the wheel which is the most important part if you want the wheels to stay. It sucks bc now we do t know what to do since we can’t get that price js anymore. Do better !
Adjustable ride height , all pieces were there , all came out to a wonderful result
It was a good build I put it in my collection

I bought this for my husband is he really likes putting model cars together. I'm not sure if it's just a dud box or if all of them are like this, but there are NO INSTRUCTIONS or a manual in this box! Luckily he's pretty good with these little bits and can figure this out. This definitely isn't something I would purchase for children as this wouldn't be easily figured out. I've purchased other models of this brand before and they all came with instructions so I'm not sure. I would not purchase this one again.

When you spend $70 on something, you expect it to be complete. Got over halfway through with this build (bag 4/6) and found it was missing a piece and it also had a deformed piece. Very frustrating! I like giving other brands a try, but this was never something experienced with the Lego brand. Quality control needs some adjustments. I'd like to say you get what you pay for, but this was an EXPENSIVE buy to not be a complete set. I had purchased two docent sets for my kids and BOTH were missing pieces!!!

Update: Company reached out and gave me the run around. Finally said they would send me a partial refund only if I would go through all these strange steps of clicking some "attachment" in their email. Well, that attachment lead to nowhere. Told them the link was broken and they said I needed to send my email. Sent them my email only for them to inform me I needed to Screen Shot my email because Amazon didn't allow customers to send companies their email. It was getting RIDICULOUS and sounded fishy!! Im pretty sure they think if they drag things out as long as possible you'll just give up. Long story short, they stopped replying and never sent any refund. Avoid this company.

Like it, enjoyable build, looks good as finished. No steering, a display model, not a toy. Yes, like it!

Pieces showed signs of less then good quality. Chrome pieces weren't completely covered, some pieces didn't hold together very well. One tire came damaged beyond use (luckily had a spare from another set that fit it)
